data.Name: DRAINER
data.Bio: There are two artists who share the drainers name. The most recent is the hardcore punk/ sound collage act from Northern Ireland and started in 2012 who can be found here http://thedrainers.bandcamp.com/ There is also a home-recording project based in Connecticut by the same name, started in 2010, influenced by over-thinking and lucid dreaming. Any releases to date can be found here: http://drainer.bandcamp.com Read more on Last.fm
